page.title: 09The Post - Some Facts
page.content:
This page is about all the prices, services and times of opening at the P.O.This comes from Rose Post Office.
Stamps: First Class......17p. Second Class.....13p.
Parcel Post: 1Kg.....Â£1.33. 5Kg.....Â£2.50. 25Kg....Â£4.15.
Special Delivery:a special service to make sure that letters,cards or packets arrive the next day.
Opening Times:9a.m.- 5p.m. each day except Wednesday (9a.m.- 1p.m.).9a.m. - 12 noon on Saturdays.There is always a P.O. open in the area so you can post a letter.
